About

I’m a front-end developer & designer and I love what I do.

My lifelong interests of language, psychology, and the visual arts inspire me to explore new avenues of design and development. I love creating a beautiful experience and writing clean semantic code. Sharing the journey with people who are also passionate about all things design-and development-related gives me the sense I've found my place in the world.
